snippet.title: Jet Car Stunts - Console Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.grip-games.com/games/jet-car-stunts/

Experience the thrill of supersonic racing, miles above the ground, where a single mistake can lead to a death fall, or head-on collision. The million-selling racing / platformer hybrid Jet Car Stunts is making a leap to PC and game consoles. 

Players will control a Jet Car - the combination of a formula racing car and a jet plane that lets them perform nearly impossible gravity-defying stunts, like driving through loops, jumping over incredible distances, corkscrew manoeuvres, drifting near the edge of the racing track, … all of that in supersonic speed. 

Grip Games, together with True Axis and bitComposer are bringing you this new take on this popular racing franchise, specially crafted for PCs and game consoles, where you will be treated with new race tracks, new jet cars, new game modes, new features and next-gen graphics.

- One of the highest reviewed racing games of all time is making leap to PC and consoles
- New cars, game modes, features and graphics
- Thrilling racing experience that combines driving and flying
- Asynchronous multiplayer lets you race against the best players wherever and whenever you like
